en.content:
Hello,

The user { emailUser } wants to authorize a new device.

Since this person already has an authorized device (or is in the process of being authorized), your approval is necessary to validate this new request â€” <italic>you have set the security rules for this vault, after all</italic> ğŸ‘®â€â™€ï¸ğŸ”
